```{r echo=F, width = 60, height = 30}
lines <- read_rds('processed_data/lines.rds')

tpal <- colorFactor(viridis::viridis(15), lines$id)

leaflet(width = "100%") %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addPolylines(data = lines,
               color = ~tpal(lines$id),
               weight = 1)

```
